page.title: 14Leisure Activities - Adults
page.content: There are many clubs for adults down the Corvedale like the {Ladies' Club, {Cricket Club, British Legion,W.I}and the{Clover Club}. The Ladies club is at(8pm till 10.30pm) on the first Tuesday every month.About 15 people go to the meetings.They have many interesting trips. There is no longer a Womens Institute in Diddlebury but there is one at Munslow. The Corvedale Cricket club is held on Sundays afternoons.Mr. Sutton is chairman of the Cricket club.The fixture list 1985 season has 15 games on it. The Clover club starts at 7.30pm till 9.45pm. It is on the first Thursday every month.There are about 40 in the club.They always use Westhope village hall.The people are over 65.
